html:
Cosmic rays go through us
When a dead rat rots on a street
Wolves hunt consequently
Deer play the forest game
Thunder strikes again nearby
The birds know what it is
None of them dies of heart attack
Fox silently spreads rabies
On the streets, riots
Dogs serve their lord
Then bright light flashes
Their lord dies in an explosion
New order emerges from chaos
Hourglass turns over again
Worms eat rotting cats
Cosmic rays go through us
title: Flow
